help::ls: to show all files in current directory.
cat: to show the content of a file.
clear: to clear the terminal window.
echo: to display some text on the terminal window.
rm: to remove a certain file. i know what you're thinking..
exit: to close the terminal window.
poweroff: to turn off the machine.
reboot: to restart the machine.
cat::Missing argument: filename (usage example: cat aboutme.txt)

cat about.txt::Welcome to my portfolio! My name is Osama and I am an 19-year-old Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating innovative and user-friendly web applications.

My skills include HTML, CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS and various frameworks and libraries. I have experience in both Front-End and Back-End development, which allows me to build dynamic and responsive websites that provide a seamless user experience. In addition to my technical skills, I also have experience working with Adobe Photoshop.I have been using this software for several years, and have developed a strong understanding of its features and capabilities.I am able to create visually appealing designs and graphics that enhance the overall look and feel of a website.I also have experience in photo editing, creating logos, and other graphics work.

I am always striving to improve my skills and stay current with the latest technologies in order to provide the best possible solutions for my clients.I am confident that my technical skills and graphic design experience make me a valuable asset for any project.I am a quick learner and a team player, I have a keen attention to detail, and I am able to meet tight deadlines.I am also able to communicate effectively with clients, team members and other stakeholders.Please take a look at my portfolio to see some of my work and if you have any questions, don't hesitate to reach out to me.
